name: Aeolus Fighter 3
description:
[Game Introduction]
"Aeolus Fighter 3" is a vertical scroll flight shooting game. Players control the protagonist's fighter plane to fight enemies in the universe.

[Game Control]
Players can control the game through keyboard, keyboard + mouse or handle.

[Game Features]
Players can obtain diamonds by destroying enemy planes, and diamonds can be used to upgrade the protagonist's fighter planes in the supply station. The types of upgrades include the number of bullets, the power of bullets, lasers, protective masks, large-scale attack weapons and so on.
Players can activate up to 4 suspended cannons, and each suspended cannon can be equipped with different shells. After defeating the specific enemy, you will get the shells of the hovering gun.
After the player defeats a specific enemy, he will get an escort fighter. Different escort fighters have different attack methods, and you can carry up to two escort fighters. Can be set in supply depots.
Players gain experience when they hit enemy planes. After the experience is full, the main gun and secondary gun of the fighter will be upgraded. After the level reaches the maximum, the protagonist fighter will enter the state of blood.
